description: Classify the document type and extract basic information

document_type.description: Type of document - must be one of: promotion, invoice, receipt, contract, letter, other

industry.description: Industry classification - must be one of: Credit Card, Banking, Insurance, Investment, Mortgage & Loans, Retail, Shipping, Technology, Telecoms, Travel, Auto, Tobacco

category.description: Category within industry - for Credit Card industry: Affinity Cards, Balance Transfer, Charge Card, Co-Branded, Corporate, Lifestyle Cards, Credit Cards

primary_company.description: Primary company making the offer or mentioned in the document

secondary_company.description: Secondary company in co-branded offers (e.g., American Airlines + Mastercard)

key_entities.description: List of key entities found in the document

date_found.description: Date found in the document (ISO format if possible)

amount_found.description: Monetary amount found in the document
